review: Recommended by a friend - wish I would have bought this when Amazon offered it for $20.  We don't have cable and I had an extra flat screen I did not want to have to buy an antenna for to get 'free tv' which I hardly watch. BUT...this gives me internet connection on that TV and I can watch my Amazon Prime, Hulu Plus, Net Flix and you tube shows.  This was extremely simple.  I did not even cuss one time.  Buying another one for the travel trailer.
author: Nelle
